title: Glass cannon Fiddlesticks is fun.
body:
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1634817943/212856744

Literally the second you ult in a teamfight you begin to melt everyone down to being dead or almost dead.

Plus, holy crap the sustain and damage from W, literally you just melt whoever you're going 1v1 against and they can't do anything except run away in hopes they're fast enough.
